member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC
member.summary: Describes a graph of DirectML operators used to compile a combined, optimized operator. See .

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.InputCount
member.summary: The number of inputs of the overall graph. Each graph input may be connected to a variable number of internal nodes, therefore this may be different from InputEdgeCount.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.OutputCount
member.summary: The number of outputs of the overall graph. Each graph output may be connected to a variable number of internal nodes, therefore this may be different from OutputEdgeCount.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.NodeCount
member.summary: The number of internal nodes in the graph.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.Nodes
member.summary: The internal nodes in the graph.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.InputEdgeCount
member.summary: The number of connections between graph inputs and inputs of internal nodes in the graph.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.InputEdges
member.summary: An array of connections between graph inputs and inputs of internal nodes in the graph. The Type field within each element should be set to .

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.OutputEdgeCount
member.summary: The number of connections between graph outputs and outputs of internal nodes in the graph.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.OutputEdges
member.summary: An array of connections between graph outputs and outputs of internal nodes in the graph. The Type field within each element should be set to .

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.IntermediateEdgeCount
member.summary: The number of internal connections between nodes in the graph.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_DESC.IntermediateEdges
member.summary: An array of connections between inputs and outputs of internal nodes in the graph. The Type field within each element should be set to
